patterns: how long will be BCA or BBM course

responses: Our college offers 4 year long BCA course and 4 year BBA course.

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: Informatics College  Kathmandu is located in Basundhara, kathmandu near Green City Hospital.

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester

responses: The single semester will be around 6 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
Academic Level
NEB +2 overall aggregate of 2.2 CGPA (55%) or above with each subject (theory and practical) grade D+ or above, and SEE Mathematics score of C+ ( 50%) or above.
For A-Levels, a minimum of 3.5 credits and atleast a grade of D and above.

English Proficiency
English NEB XII Marks greater or equals to 60% or 2.4 GPA
For Level 4 or Year 1 BIT
Pass in General Paper or English Language or IELTS 5.5 or PTE 47/ Meeting UCAS Tariff points of 80.
For Level 4 or Year 1 BBA
Pass in General Paper or English Language or IELTS 5.5 or PTE 47/ Meeting UCAS Tariff points of 96.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be two or five classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour .

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses: Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Nepal
which stands for Lecture
Tutorial and Workshop.
There are written exams which carry more weight than your assignments
The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.

patterns: How do I apply to the college?
Can you help me with the application process?
responses: You can apply to our college through our online portal. The admission requirements vary depending on the program you're interested in. You can find more information on our website or contact the admissions office for further assistance.

patterns: How do I register for classes?
When is registration for the upcoming semester?
What are the steps to register for courses?
responses: You can register for classes through our student portal. Registration for the upcoming semester typically starts a few months before classes begin. You can find more information on our website or contact the registrar's office for further assistance.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet. 
 Also our college has basketball court,  table tennis, chess.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like  internet, library,  discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
